faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about DevIX
faq1_answer: We follow a proven methodology: research and planning, design, development, testing and deployment. We keep you updated with regular demos and feedback sessions.
faq2_answer: We build websites and web applications on modern stack: Django, Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS. We select architecture and technologies based on business needs to make the product fast, reliable and scalable.
faq3_answer: Yes! We offer maintenance packages, hosting management and technical support. We're here to help your website thrive after launch.
faq4_question: What is the typical project timeline?
faq4_answer: Timeline depends on complexity, but most projects take 1-4 weeks. We provide detailed timelines at the planning stage and commit to realistic deadlines.
faq5_question: Do you sign a contract for services?
faq5_answer: Yes, we work under contract. The contract can be signed electronically and is legally binding. All cooperation terms (deadlines, cost, technical specifications) are agreed upon in advance and documented.
